title: Submit an End of Period Statement for a Business Endpoint
description: This endpoint allows the developer to submit a declaration that the submission data for a business is complete. A National Insurance number is required.

typeOfBusiness.description: The type of business the the declaration is for.

businessId.description: An identifier for the business, unique to the customer.

accountingPeriod.description: Object containing the accounting period start and end dates

startDate.description: The date the accounting period started. Must be in the format YYYY-MM-DD.

endDate.description: The date the accounting period ended. Must be in the format YYYY-MM-DD.

finalised.description: Indicates the declaration for the finalised statement. The value can only be set to true.
